00048 template<typename T> uWriterBase * createT()
00049 {
00050     return new T;
00051 }
00052 
00053 struct uWriterBaseFactory
00054 {
00055     typedef std::map<std::string, std::function<uWriterBase*()> > map_type;
00056     virtual ~uWriterBaseFactory() {}
00057     static std::shared_ptr<uWriterBase> createInstance(std::string const& s)
00058     {
00059         map_type::iterator it = getMap()->find(s);
00060         if(it == getMap()->end())
00061     {
00062             return nullptr;
00063         }
00064         return std::shared_ptr<uWriterBase>(it->second());
00065     }
00066 
00067 protected:
00068     static map_type* mapItem;
00069         static map_type* getMap()
00070     {
00071         if(!mapItem)
00072     {
00073             mapItem= new map_type;
00074         }
00075         return mapItem;
00076     };
00077 }; // End of struct uWriterBaseFactory
00078 
00079 template<typename T>
00080 struct DerivedRegister : uWriterBaseFactory
00081 {
00082     ~DerivedRegister(){};
00083     DerivedRegister(std::string const& s)
00084     {
00085         getMap()->insert(std::pair<std::string, std::function<uWriterBase*() >> (s, &createT<T>));
00086     }
00087 }; // End of struct DerivedRegister
